hadiths.text: Narrated Umm Habibah: Mu'awiyah ibn AbuSufyan asked his sister Umm Habibah, the wife of the Prophet (ﷺ): Would the apostle of Allah (ﷺ) pray in the clothe in which he had an intercourse? She said: Yes, when he would not see any impurity in it

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ فِي الثَّوْبِ الَّذِي يُصِيبُ أَهْلَهُ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Praying In A Garment In Which He Has Engaged In Intercourse
